mapper.select: SELECT m.market_name as marketName, c.category_name as categoryName, i.product_name as productName, i.origin as origin, i.product_cost_price as productCostPrice, i.weight as weight, i.market_id as marketId, i.category_id as categoryId, i.create_date as createDate FROM cbec_product_category c, cbec_product_item i, cbec_market m WHERE i.category_id = c.category_id AND i.market_id = m.market_id AND m.market_id= #{marketId} AND c.category_id=#{categoryId}
